message: I understand you wanting to divide fairly, but the value decreases for me each round.  This is a counter offer.
Considering the inflation, I'll offer a bit more.
I appreciate the improved offer, but the decreasing value makes it difficult. I need a larger share to make it worthwhile.
I'll give a bit more, but I need a fair share too.
Alice, we're running out of time. This offer is the best chance for both of us to gain something significant before the money loses too much value for me.
I'll give a bit more, but I won't go below 5400.
